<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.CSMDefaultResourceHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>CSMDefaultResourceHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CSMDefaultResourceHelper = Class.create();
CSMDefaultResourceHelper.prototype = {
	RECOMMENDED_RESOLVED_CASES_SOURCE_ID: '48bcecc57f602300a8b1bdc8adfa9140',
	RESOLVED_CASES_SOURCE_ID: '64f54a8793d02300a591f5be867ffb48',
	RECOMMENDED_RESOLVED_CASES_SOLUTION_DEFNITION_ID: '3e9cf2287fa02300a8b1bdc8adfa9121',
	CSMWorkspaceSearchContext: '0181671d7f062300a8b1bdc8adfa9198',
    initialize: function() {},
	
	process: function(gr) {
		if (gr.sys_id == this.RECOMMENDED_RESOLVED_CASES_SOLUTION_DEFNITION_ID || gr.getValue('solution_definition') == this.RECOMMENDED_RESOLVED_CASES_SOLUTION_DEFNITION_ID) {
			if (this.checkSolution(gr) || this.checkSolutionDef(gr)) {
				//set Recommended Resolved Cases(Similarity) as default addtional resource
				this.setDefaultResource(this.RECOMMENDED_RESOLVED_CASES_SOURCE_ID);
			} else {
				//set Resolved Cases(Table) as default addtional resource
				this.setDefaultResource(this.RESOLVED_CASES_SOURCE_ID);
			}
		}
	},
	
	checkSolutionDef: function(gr) {
		if (gr.getTableName() == 'ml_solution_definition' && gr.active) {
			var solutionGr = new GlideRecord('ml_solution');
			solutionGr.addActiveQuery();
			solutionGr.addQuery('solution_definition', gr.sys_id);
			solutionGr.query();
			if (solutionGr.next()) {
				return this.checkAdditionalResource(gr.sys_id);
			}
		}
		return false;
	},
	
	checkSolution: function(gr) {
		if (gr.getTableName() == 'ml_solution' && gr.active) {
			var solutionDefGr = new GlideRecord('ml_solution_definition');
			if (solutionDefGr.get(gr.solution_definition) && solutionDefGr.active) {
				return this.checkAdditionalResource(gr.solution_definition);
			}
		}
		return false;
	},
	
	checkAdditionalResource: function(SolutionDefSysId) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('cxs_search_res_config');
		gr.addQuery('cxs_solution_definition', SolutionDefSysId);
		gr.query();
		if (gr.next()) {
			return gr.sys_id == this.RECOMMENDED_RESOLVED_CASES_SOURCE_ID;
		}
		return false;
	},
	
	setDefaultResource: function(resourceId) {
		var cxsConfigGr = new GlideRecord('cxs_res_context_config');
		cxsConfigGr.addQuery('cxs_search_res_config', resourceId);
		cxsConfigGr.addQuery('cxs_context_config', this.CSMWorkspaceSearchContext);
		cxsConfigGr.query();
		if (cxsConfigGr.next()) {
			cxsConfigGr.default_search = true;
			cxsConfigGr.update();
		}
	},
	
    type: 'CSMDefaultResourceHelper'
};]]></script>
